description: Try our easy to follow Chilli & Melon Sorbet With Ham recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chilli & Melon Sorbet With Ham Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the melon quarters and ham on 6 serving plates. Use warm spoons to scoop out the sorbet and put 2 spoonfuls of sorbet on top of each melon quarter. Garnish with strips of chilli and serve immediately.
